article.headline: Appalachian St. 59, La Salle 48
article.story: CHARLOTTE AMALIE, U.S. Virgin Islands (AP) -- Chris McFarland had 19 points and 10 rebounds to lead Appalachian State to a 59-48 victory over La Salle in the fifth-place game at the Paradise Jam tournament Monday. Noah Brown added 20 points in a reserve role for the Mountaineers (1-2). Jermaine Thomas led the Explorers (0-3) with 17 points. Steven Smith added 11 points and David Bell finished with eight points and eight rebounds. There were three lead changes in the first half before the Mountaineers went on a 17-4 run in the first nine minutes of the second half. McFarland scored 11 points in the second half, including six during the early run.
